title: Egypt Joins China ILRS Lunar Base Program
summary: Egypt is the latest country to sign a cooperation aggrement for China's International Lunar Research Station (ILRS).

title: Three satellites presumed lost in Transporter deployment malfunction
summary: Three satellites on a SpaceX Transporter rideshare launch in November failed to deploy, including one from a company that previously stated its satellite was in orbit and operating.

title: US Space Force Activates Europe and Africa Components
summary: USSPACEFOR-EURAF is now the newest service component under EUCOM and AFRICOM, joining the ranks of U.S. Indo-Pacific Command and U.S. Central Command in establishing a dedicated space component.

title: Ghana Warns Against Unauthorized Starlink Use
summary: Ghana has become the latest African nation to caution its citizens against using Starlink services before proper licensing is granted by the National Communications Authority.

title: Blue Origin New Shepard VR Experience Lands At NASA KSC Visitor Complex
summary: An immersive virtual reality experience inside a replica of Blue Origin’s New Shepard has landed at NASA Kennedy Space Centers Visitor Complex!
